attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks for public use. Limit to displays and organisers only!
attributes.additional_details: I’m surprised that this hasn’t been done already. I’ve always believed that sale of fireworks should only be allowed with a license to prevent serious injuries and the discomfort of pets and animals in general.
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks to the general public. A license should be required to purchase fireworks. This is well overdue!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
